name: Space Force: Orbital Ordeal
description:
Welcome to the SPACE FORCE, cadet!

Unfortunately, we spent the entire budget coming up with the name SPACE FORCE, so we couldn't afford to get you any equipment.

Luckily, we managed to borrow a tank from the army, so get out there and make your country proud!

Defend the planet from incoming asteroids using the recoil of your shots to move. Created for Ludum Dare 47 (Theme: Stuck in a loop)
